body:
Pandas finally came out with a stable 1.0 release! Among other things, they plan on actually using SemVer from now on. See https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/whatsnew/v1.0.0.html for more changes.

Successfully installs on macOS 10.15.4 with Python 3.7.7 and Clang 11.0.3.
title: py-pandas: add 1.0.X release
